Preprocessing

centralized_nlp_package.preprocessing.text_processing.initialize_spacy_model(config)[source]

Initializes and configures the SpaCy model with custom settings.

Parameters:

config (Config) – Configuration object containing model settings.

Returns:

Configured SpaCy model.

Return type:

spacy.Language

centralized_nlp_package.preprocessing.text_processing.word_tokenize(doc, nlp)[source]

Tokenizes and lemmatizes a document using SpaCy.

Parameters:

  • doc (str) – The input text document.

  • nlp (spacy.Language) – Initialized SpaCy model.

Returns:

List of lemmatized tokens.

Return type:

List[str]

centralized_nlp_package.preprocessing.ngram_utils.find_ngrams(input_list, n)[source]

Generates n-grams from a list of tokens.

Parameters:

  • input_list (List[str]) – List of tokens.

  • n (int) – The number of tokens in each n-gram.

Yields:

Iterator[Tuple[str, …]] – An iterator over n-grams as tuples.

Return type:

Iterator[Tuple[str, ...]]

centralized_nlp_package.preprocessing.ngram_utils.get_model_ngrams(text, model)[source]

Replaces tokens in the text with their corresponding n-grams if they exist in the Word2Vec model.

Parameters:

  • text (List[str]) – List of tokens from the text.

  • model (Word2Vec) – Trained Word2Vec model.

Returns:

List of tokens with possible n-gram replacements.

Return type:

List[str]
